channel.title: My local band
channel.description:
Hey guys, i thought I'd show you guys my local band, in Regina, Saskatchewan. They recently moved genre's, so, if you like metal check 'em out! :) They sorta mixed it up with Pop. xD I think you'd like 'em! <3
[size=18pt]Rest[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KU0R_YzRXV4&feature=g-all-u

item.title: My local band
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

The drummer sucks to put it simple, vocals are very mono-toned and difficult to understand, but some of the guitar riffs are particularly nice at 00:52 - 1:06, reminds me of the band Fightstar.

Read full topic

item.title: My local band
item.dc:creator: @pengu pengu
item.description:
@pengu wrote:

Ruby:

the drummer is too loud he/she overpowers the whole band.

Remember, there are basicly only 2 band members… The other ones bailed on the vocalist. :c And the drummer isn’t even an official band member. So, it’s just the vocalist, my friend Alex, and the drummer he had in this song.

Read full topic

item.title: My local band
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Instrumental in the beginning was pretty good, everything else was pretty bad tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: My local band
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Why does it sound like someones mumbling in the background throughout the whole song? And secondly, how is this even remotely metal? Unless my concept of what metal is would be completely different from others. Anyway, do what oldschool said and good luck in the feature!

Read full topic

item.title: My local band
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

You need to master it, try te make a new mix-down (i hope for you, you record all instruments/vocals seperate?)

Read full topic

item.title: My local band
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2, topic:454470”]The instruments alone remind me of Snow Patrol until 1:10, then everything becomes a clusterfuck.

I mean, they’re okay, but his vocals are like wat, the drummer is too loud he/she overpowers the whole band.

I thought it’d get better towards the end, everything just got louder and got more muddled up…[/quote]
Pretty much summed it up for me… 0.0

Read full topic

item.title: My local band
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

The hi-hat is really loud.
